question: Which Indian newspaper that was being published in the United States for 50 years has ceased its printed edition?
explanation:
One of the ethnic Indian newspapers which was being published in the United States for the last 50 years named ‘India Abroad’ stopped its printed edition recently, amidst the coronavirus outbreak.
It was founded by Indian-American publisher Gopal Raju in the year 1970. The newspaper focussed mainly on Indian news which catered to the Indian diaspora in the United States. The expatriate community in the US were the main audience for the newspaper.
